item.title: Staying in Michigan: Aidan Hutchinson, Lions Agree to 4-Year Extension
item.description: The Lions have extended one of the game's top defensive players, giving Aidan Hutchinson a four-year deal.

item.title: 2025 NFL Week 9 Buzz: Joe Flacco Has Shoulder Injury; Vikings Add QB
item.description: We're tracking the latest on what's happening around the NFL heading into Week 9 of the 2025 season.

item.title: Lamar Jackson Asked Ravens Owner to Remove Games From Locker Room
item.description: After missing three games with a hamstring injury, superstar QB Lamar Jackson assessed Baltimore's situation upon his return this week.

item.title: Trey Yesavage's Unusual Arm Angle Has Given Blue Jays Rookie An Advantage
